en.title: QP Wearer, Regina Lopez, CEO ABS-CBN Foundation, Philippines supports "Christmas For Payatas"!
en.content:
FE would like to thank QP Wearer Regina Lopez, CEO of ABS-CBN Foundation Philippines (Regina's family also owns the TV station ABS-CBN which broadcast throughout the Philippines and overseas through cable TV to millions of overseas Filipinos) for her support of the global "Christmas For Payatas" Charity of which FE is a major donor and sponsor.

FE's Philippines Country Licensee Jeremy Looi performed the balance test, strength test, flexibility test and mobile handphone test on Regina who was very impressed with the instant results of FE's Quantum Pendant. Also present at the meeting were FE Leaders Pastor Art, Judge Lorenzo, Vilma Selga, Joy Sta Teresa and Jonathan JJ Lizarondo.

meta.description: FusionExcel would like to thank Quantum Pendant Wearer Regina Lopez, CEO of ABS-CBN Foundation Philippines for her support of the global ¡®Christmas For Payatas¡¯ Charity.
